instruction: Write a announcement tweet for medium.com readers about the new blogpost on "Open Assistant is open source ChatGPT that you don't wanna miss out"
output:
"Attention all #AI enthusiasts and developers! 🚀 We're excited to announce the launch of our new blogpost on "Open Assistant: The Open Source ChatGPT You Don't Want to Miss Out On"! 📄

In this post, we'll be exploring the world of Open Assistant, an open-source alternative to ChatGPT that you won't want to miss out on. We'll delve into its features, capabilities, and how you can get started with it today. 💻

So, whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out in the world of AI, this blogpost is for you! 🌟

Read the full post here: [Link to the blogpost]

Don't forget to share your thoughts and questions in the comments below! 💬

#OpenAssistant #ChatGPT #AI #OpenSource #Development"
